  Learning new things daily

Community Server 2007 Theming Extravaganza

I have been doing most of my CS “news” blogging over on the DailyNews (rss). I am certainly no Dave Burke, but I do hope to keep the CS news flowing.

However, we just announced something really fun that I think a lot of you may be interested in:

Community Server 2007 Theming Extravaganza

The new Chameleon Theming Engine makes creating a custom theme unbelievable easy. To help show and motivate you to give a shot we are holding our first ever theming contest with some great prizes: 2 MacBooks, 2 XBox 360 Elites, Amazon gift cards and free Community Server Personal Edition licenses for anyone who enters!

You have until May 28th, but there is no time like the present to get started.

Posted on Apr 27, 2007 and tagged as community-events, telligent, community-server, chameleon
